name: Bad Draw!
description:
A turn-based Strategy game about a card fighting some dice, where you must manage your bullets well, as their damage are simply a roll of the dice. 

The chips have come to settle their long-time rivalry between them and the cards. It is up to you, the king of all cards, to stop them.

With your trusty revolver in hand, you prepare for the coming waves of chips. Hopefully, you don't have a Bad Draw.

Every round, chips will march towards you in 3 lanes. Use the number on the dice's heads to determine who you shoot. However be careful, every shot or reload counts as one turn allowing the chips to progressively come closer and closer to you, eventually damaging your health if they are in front of you.

Controls: 

Left mouse click: to shoot

spacebar: to reload

Powerups: 

x2: doubles your damage for that clip

heart: adds health

6: makes all bullets into 6 damage
